title: Yasuo tilting you? Try our patented Critaway (Patent Pending)
body:
The CRITAWAY uses a high-density {{champion:33}} body to deter any AD champion, coupled with an ultra-light high-sheen carbon nanofibre coating of {{item:3075}} to give the edge. A shock absorption system made up of {{item:3143}} {{item:3047}} bolsters the already formidable {{item:3068}}. A high-velocity wax-coated speed-tested shell of {{item:3742}} backs the final component, a super-cooled ultra-high-resistance heatshield: {{item:3110}}. The particular order of these components may vary from game to game, including replacing the adaptive defense shell thermal exhaust emitter with a monomolecular fibre vitality enhancer and thermal release valve: {{item:1401}} {{item:1409}} {{item:1413}}. This entire highly-adaptable system is reinforced by NINE count them NINE scaling armor seals, NINE scaling magic resist glyphs, NINE attack speed or armor marks, and no less than THREE armor quintessences! A carefully-planned 8(0)/0(8)/12 mastery page offers the ultimate in refined defense buffs! Enjoy your AD-Free games!

Thank you for considering CRITAWAY! Please place your order now, as supply is dropping fast!

i thought i was the only one building multiple randuins while facing a lot of crit champions.
Does the crit reduction stack?
yeah it does
Tabi reduce basic attacks/single target by 12% and Randuins reduces CRIT by 10%. They do indeed stack.

This didn't help me in the least.

 Yasuo is _still_ on my team, raging at our jungler.

I demand a refund.
Except, you know, he ults and suddenly it's like you have half as much gold as you actually do.

Except, you know, someone confuses lethality and Yasuo as the same thing, and end up making the topic dumb for everyone.

Like, you know, his ult buff being bonus armor penetration and not total armor, and it only being 50%, and well, Yasuo never building armor pen most of the time.

You can't be serious xd

Yes, that's why I said half as much -gold-.

As in, gold buys you items, and items are what gives you bonus armor. So when Yasuo ults you and you have a full armor build you go from 8k gold to 4k gold. (Not accounting for runes, masteries and Rammus W which gives you 120 bonus armor, these get halved as well).

You.... you really don't know how his armor pen works....
And you're a yasuo main..... 
{{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}}

"For the next 15 seconds, Yasuo's critical strikes gain 50% bonus armor penetration" 
Not "They gain 50% of his armor penetration"
It is a free last whisper.

UNIQUE – LAST WHISPER: +30% bonus armor penetration.
Notice how that reduces armor, even if you don't have other lethality items.

They're a Yasuo main in Bronze.

You shouldn't be that surprised.

DO you have ANY chill?
A: I'm unranked and I've played one ranked game, so IDK how you got Bronze from that.
B: It was meant as a lighthearted post. Get your head out of your ass.

That post wasn't related to you in the least.

  I was referring to Yaśuo Main  for his post above in which he falsely described how Yasuo's ultimate works when attempting to "correct" OrangeSilk.

It is the one hidden because "Comment is below threshold".
-------------------
> A: I'm unranked and I've played one ranked game, so IDK how you got Bronze from that.

While I wasn't referring to you, you should know that people will typically look at a player's ranking in the previous season if they haven't played a sufficient amount of games in the current season.
--------------------
You made a mistake, it happens, no need to start insulting people for imagined slights.
Huh. Well sorry I guess,I misread that and didn't  see the offending comment, so I thought it was directed at me.

Understandable.

Are you using chronological view?

I mean I don't think you can pin this on the rank alone. I'm pretty sure an actual bronze Thresh main may only land 2/85 hooks but will still understand how his fucking passive and lantern work. Being a main doesn't necessarily make you good at it but you can't really call yourself a main if you don't even know/understand the fucking numbers.
Refer to my response to your friend.

No one was talking to you, we were talking to the "Yasuo Main"

Hence why we replied to his comment, not your post.
Eh, the OP may be using the Chronological view or something.
That's a thing?

Between the OP and the Comment Textarea, to the left.

I'm not sure why anyone would use it, but it is there.

> [{quoted}](name=deadlychuck,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=q3rixpcM,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2017-02-21T15:03:31.648+0000)
>
> in blind pick... 

Mistake #1.

Yeah, that's not a mistake, that's a preference.

The real mistake is thinking that there should be a "correct" preference.
The thing is league is balanced around draft pick

Sure, and it's a terrible decision.

The game will never be "balanced", but if you ensure that no champion is completely broken, by balancing around blind pick, then the meta in draft modes will be determined by the community, rather than riot giving certain champions the spotlight when they feel like it.

If you design the balance of the game around the assumption of pick strategy, then the game develops serious issues without it. However, if you design the balance of the game around the assumption that you will not have pick strategy, then it doesn't remove the pick strategy from the game modes which have it. It's fine to adjust different aspects of picking process to better reflect what is needed to stop the same exact things from occurring every game, however when you start to adjust the game itself, around aspects of the picking process, then you've got a serious philosophical issue with your game design.
solution: play draft.
Unfortunately, armor doesn't really mean much anymore. ADCs (and Yasuo) will still instagib you, and even Rammus can't do much since lifesteal is so absurd right now.
You'd still lose, unfortunately. ADCs aren't allowed to have counterplay or be counterbuilt.

I'm pretty sure a Rammus rolling in with 800 ms, a strong aoe slow, the slow from dead man's, his taunt, his ult, thornmail, his W damage with 530 armor, and about 230 AD will crush any ADC and still have at least 3/4 remaining HP.
Needs more Warmogs.

This is why I play {{champion:5}}.

Yasuo on the enemy team? FIGHT ME BITCH. I'd 1v1 that bastard no problem. Got no projectiles for him to windwall, my knockup and my knockback will interrupt his incessant dashing, my E will burst his pathetic shield and leave him wide open for my auto-attacks, and I can match his damage.

Yasuo on my team? I have a knockup and a knockback for his ult. In fact, even just my sheer manly presence often causes enemy squishies to dash away, opening them up to his ult too.
Dude I LOVE Xin! He's one of my favorite champs now - he's so powerful and still synergizes with Yasuo/Counters the BS Yasuo, Riven,a nd all those other annoying champs have!

The year is 2015... {{champion:90}} still counters yasuo
